knimeNode.name: TensorFlow Network Exporter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Exports a TensorFlow network to a file.

fullDescription.intro: Exports a TensorFlow network to a file or directory.
fullDescription.option:
The exporter to use.
TensorFlow SavedModel ZIP Exporter: Exports a TensorFlow model as a SavedModel which is compressed to a ZIP file.
See ' Structure of a SavedModel directory ' for information on SavedModels.
The location of the output file. KNIME URLs like "knime://knime.workflow/ ... <filename>" are supported.
